TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule), ISerializable

public: ref class TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule sealed : IEquatable<TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule ^>, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 提供有关时区调整的信息，例如与夏令时的相互转换。

span.span: Provides information about a time zone adjustment, such as the transition to and from daylight saving time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的有效起始和结束日期的特定时间更改到和从夏时制，分别定义，以及其增量 （的确切数据量依据进行此调整会导致时区的标准时间更改）。The class defines the effective start and end dates of a particular time change to and from daylight saving time, respectively, as well as its delta (the exact amount by which the adjustment causes the time zone's standard time to change). 此外，两个属性返回定义从标准时间与每个转换发生时的对象。In addition, two properties return objects that define when each transition to and from standard time occurs. > [!NOTE] > 实例类是不可变。An instance of the class is immutable. 一旦创建对象后，无法修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. 若要创建对象，请调用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。To create a object, call the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 然后，你可以提供的数组的对象添加到两个重载方法。You can then supply an array of objects to two of the overloads of the method. 若要检索特定时区的调整规则，请调用其方法，返回的数组对象。To retrieve the adjustment rules of a particular time zone, call its method, which returns an array of objects. ## Examples 下面的示例检索在本地系统上定义的所有时区，并显示有关其调整规则的完整信息。The following example retrieves all time zones defined on the local system and displays complete information about their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#3)] 下面是输出的生成该示例一小部分。The following is a small portion of the output that is generated by the example. 确切的输出将因操作系统和在其运行该示例的日期。The exact output will vary depending on the operating system and the date on which the example is run. ``` Morocco Standard Time Adjustment rules Adjustment rule #1 Start Date: Tuesday, January 01, 2008 End Date: Wednesday, December 31, 2008 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Saturday of May at 11:59 PM Annual End: The Last Sunday of August at 11:59 PM Adjustment rule #2 Start Date: Thursday, January 01, 2009 End Date: Thursday, December 31, 2009 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of May at 11:59 PM Annual End: The Third Thursday of August at 11:59 PM Coordinated Universal Time has no adjustment rules GMT Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 1:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 2:00 AM Greenwich Standard Time has no adjustment rules W. Europe Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Central Europe Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Romance Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Central European Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM W. Central Africa Standard Time has no adjustment rules ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule CreateAdjustmentRule (DateTime dateStart, DateTime dateEnd, TimeSpan daylightDelta, TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd);

.method public static hidebysig class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule CreateAdjustmentRule(valuetype System.DateTime dateStart, valuetype System.DateTime dateEnd, valuetype System.TimeSpan daylightDelta, valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd) cil managed

Public Shared Function CreateAdjustmentRule (dateStart As DateTime, dateEnd As DateTime, daylightDelta As TimeSpan, daylightTransitionStart As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime, daylightTransitionEnd As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime) As TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule

public: static TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule ^ CreateAdjustmentRule(DateTime dateStart, DateTime dateEnd, TimeSpan daylightDelta, TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd);

param.name: dateStart

span.span: The effective date of the adjustment rule.

param.span: 如果 dateStart 参数的值为 ，那么这是时区的第一个有效的调整规则。

span.span: If the value of the dateStart parameter is , this is the first adjustment rule in effect for a time zone.

param.name: dateEnd
param.span: 执行调整规则的最后日期。

span.span: The last date that the adjustment rule is in force.

param.span: 如果 dateEnd 参数的值为 ，则调整规则无结束日期。

span.span: If the value of the dateEnd parameter is , the adjustment rule has no end date.

param.name: daylightDelta
param.span: 调整所产生的时间更改。

span.span: The time change that results from the adjustment.

param.span: 将该值添加到时区的 属性，以便获取从协调世界时 (UTC) 开始的正确的夏令时偏移量。

span.span: This value is added to the time zone's property to obtain the correct daylight offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

param.span: 该值的范围介于 -14 到 14。

span.span: This value can range from -14 to 14.

param.name: daylightTransitionStart
param.span: 定义夏令时的开始时间的对象。

span.span: An object that defines the start of daylight saving time.

param.name: daylightTransitionEnd
param.span: 定义夏令时的结束时间的对象。

span.span: An object that defines the end of daylight saving time.

summary.span: 为特定时区创建新调整规则。

span.span: Creates a new adjustment rule for a particular time zone.

returns.span: 表示新调整规则的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the new adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于创建自定义时区的一个或多个调整规则。You can use this method to create one or more adjustment rules for a custom time zone. 数组然后通过调用此方法返回的对象可以作为传递`adjustmentRules`两个重载的参数方法。An array of the objects returned by calls to this method can then be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter to two overloads of the method. 该示例阐释了此过程。The example illustrates this procedure. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以用于仅定义新的时区调整规则; 它不能用于修改现有的时区调整规则。The method can be used only to define an adjustment rule for a new time zone; it cannot be used to modify an adjustment rule for an existing time zone. `dateStart`和`dateEnd`参数必须是不带时间部分的日期值或引发。The `dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters must be date values without a time component or an is thrown. 可以通过检索删除时间组件值的日期和时间的属性中的以下语句所示：The time component can be removed by retrieving a value from the date and time's property as shown in the following statements: ``` DateTime.MinValue.Date DateTime.MaxValue.Date DateTime.Now.Date dateVariable.Date ``` 属性`dateStart`和`dateEnd`参数还必须是。The property of the `dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters must also be . 值`daylightDelta`参数可以介于-14 到 14。The value of the `daylightDelta` parameter can range from -14 to 14. 总和`daylightDelta`参数和`baseUtcOffset`对的调用中使用参数方法也必须必须介于-14 到 14 或引发。The sum of the `daylightDelta` parameter and the `baseUtcOffset` parameter used in the call to the method must also range from -14 to 14 or an is thrown. > [!NOTE] > `daylightDelta`参数定义时区的标准时间和其夏时制之间的差异。The `daylightDelta` parameter defines the difference between a time zone's standard time and its daylight saving time. 它不是定义时区的标准时间偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。It is not intended to define the time zone's standard time offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 类假定此相对于 UTC 的偏移量为时区的整个生存期常数。The class assumes that this offset from UTC is constant throughout the life of the time zone. 若要反映与不由应用程序的调整规则引起的 UTC 的时区偏移量的变化，你必须使用方法来创建新的自定义时区。To reflect a change in a time zone's offset from UTC that is not caused by the application of an adjustment rule, you must use the method to create a new custom time zone. ## Examples 下面的示例创建备用的中部标准时区并定义三个调整规则的高峰期间 1976年-1986、 1987年-2006年，2007年和更高版本。The following example creates an alternate Central Standard Time zone and defines three adjustment rules for the periods 1976-1986, 1987-2006, and 2007 and beyond. 这些规则添加到泛型其元素然后复制到的对象数组。These rules are added to a generic object whose elements are then copied to a array. 此数组然后用于调用方法。This array is then used in the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#1)]

span.span: The property of the parameter does not equal a whole number of seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime DateEnd { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime DateEnd
Public ReadOnly Property DateEnd As DateTime
public: property DateTime DateEnd { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取调整规则失效的日期。

span.span: Gets the date when the adjustment rule ceases to be in effect.

value.span: 值，指示调整规则失效的日期。

span.span: A value that indicates the end date of the adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性是不带时间部分的日期值。The value of the property is a date value without a time component. 因为当前的调整规则的结束日期通常不知道，你可以分配`DateTime.MaxValue.Date`到时创建自定义的调整规则的属性。Because the end date of the current adjustment rule is typically not known, you can assign `DateTime.MaxValue.Date` to the property when you create a custom adjustment rule. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果没有人信服的理由，否则，应定义要在此期间时区采用标准时间的时间间隔内发生的调整规则的结束日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do otherwise, you should define the adjustment rule's end date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes standard time. 如果没有令人信服的理由，否则，不应定义要在此期间时区使用夏令时的时间间隔内发生的调整规则的结束日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do so, you should not define the adjustment rule's end date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes daylight saving time. 例如，如果从夏令时的时区的转换发生在年 3 月的第三个星期日和其转换为夏时制发生在 10 月的第一个星期日，调整规则的有效结束日期不应为特定的年 12 月 31 日年，因为该日期的夏时制段内发生。For example, if a time zone's transition from daylight saving time occurs on the third Sunday of March and its transition to daylight saving time occurs on the first Sunday of October, the effective end date of the adjustment rule should not be December 31 of a particular year, since that date occurs within the period of daylight saving time. 默认情况下，Windows XP 中的注册表中定义一个调整规则，其结束日期为 9999 年 12 月 31 日星期五 (的值`DateTime.MaxValue.Date`)，为每个时区。By default, the registry in Windows XP defines a single adjustment rule whose end date is Friday, December 31, 9999 (the value of `DateTime.MaxValue.Date`), for each time zone. 对于在美国国内的时区，在 Windows Vista 注册表将两个调整规则定义：For time zones in the United States, the registry in Windows Vista defines two adjustment rules: - 年 1 月 1 日星期一 0001 到 2006 年 12 月 31日日，星期日。Monday, January 01, 0001, to Sunday, December 31, 2006. - 星期一，01，2007 2007年 1 月，至 12 月 31 日，星期五，9999。Monday, January 01, 2007, to Friday, December 31, 9999. 这意味着，虽然时区调整规则存储在注册表中可用于执行当前所在的时区相关操作，但它们不能可靠地用于检索历史时区信息。This means that, although time zone adjustment rules stored in the registry are useful for performing current time zone-related operations, they cannot be reliably used for retrieving historical time zone information. 有关在历史时区识别应用程序中定义自定义的时区，并带有多个可用的调整规则的信息，请参阅[如何： 创建带有调整规则的时间区域](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For information about defining a custom time zone with multiple adjustment rules that can be used in a historical time zone-aware application, see [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示有关在本地计算机的系统注册表中，包括起始和结束日期其调整规则定义的时区的所有信息。The following example displays information about all of the time zones defined in the local computer's system registry, including the starting and ending dates of their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/cs/DateStart1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/vb/DateStart1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime DateStart { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime DateStart
Public ReadOnly Property DateStart As DateTime
public: property DateTime DateStart { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取调整规则生效的日期。

span.span: Gets the date when the adjustment rule takes effect.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指示调整规则生效的日期。

span.span: A value that indicates when the adjustment rule takes effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性是不带时间部分的日期值。The value of the property is a date value without a time component. 它定义在其特定的调整规则生效的日期。It defines the date on which a particular adjustment rule goes into effect. 这是一套 （这通常由一个转换为夏时制和定义一个转换回标准时间） 的转换将生效的日期。This is the date in which a set of transitions (which typically are defined by one transition to daylight savings time and one transition back to standard time) go into effect. 例如，调整规则可能进入 2017 年 1 月 1 日，影响，它提供了到年 3 月的第二个星期日夏时制转换回标准时间转换年 11 月的第一个星期日。For example, an adjustment rule might go into effect on January 1, 2017, that provides for a transition to daylight savings time on the second Sunday of March and for a transition back to standard time on the first Sunday of November. 请注意，调整规则的开始日期不依赖于第一个转换的日期。Note that the starting date of the adjustment rule is not tied to the date of the first transition. 你可以分配`DateTime.MinValue.Date`到属性在创建时使用的自定义的调整规则在时区识别应用程序中，没有用于历史时区信息。You can assign `DateTime.MinValue.Date` to the property when you create a custom adjustment rule for use in a time zone-aware application that does not have to work with historic time zone information. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果没有人信服的理由，否则，应定义要在此期间时区采用标准时间的时间间隔内发生的调整规则的开始日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do otherwise, you should define the adjustment rule's start date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes standard time. 如果没有令人信服的理由，否则，不应定义调整规则的开始日期时间时区采用夏时制的时间间隔内发生。Unless there is a compelling reason to do so, you should not define the adjustment rule's start date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes daylight saving time. 例如，如果从夏令时的时区的转换发生在年 3 月的第三个星期日和其转换为夏时制发生在 10 月的第一个星期日，调整规则的有效开始日期不应为 1 月 1 日的特定年，因为该日期的夏时制段内发生。For example, if a time zone's transition from daylight saving time occurs on the third Sunday of March and its transition to daylight saving time occurs on the first Sunday of October, the effective start date of the adjustment rule should not be January 1 of a particular year, since that date occurs within the period of daylight saving time. 默认情况下，Windows XP 中的注册表中定义一个调整规则的开始日期为 0001 年 1 月 1 日星期一 (的值`DateTime.MinValue.Date`)，为每个时区。By default, the registry in Windows XP defines a single adjustment rule whose start date is Monday, January 01, 0001 (the value of `DateTime.MinValue.Date`), for each time zone. 对于在美国国内的时区，在 Windows Vista 注册表将两个调整规则定义：For time zones in the United States, the registry in Windows Vista defines two adjustment rules: - 年 1 月 1 日星期一 0001 到 2006 年 12 月 31日日，星期日。Monday, January 01, 0001, to Sunday, December 31, 2006. - 星期一，01，2007 2007年 1 月，至 12 月 31 日，星期五，9999。Monday, January 01, 2007, to Friday, December 31, 9999. 这意味着，虽然时区调整规则存储在注册表中可用于执行当前所在的时区相关操作，但它们不能可靠地用于检索历史时区信息。This means that, although time zone adjustment rules stored in the registry are useful for performing current time zone-related operations, they cannot be reliably used for retrieving historical time zone information. 有关在历史时区识别应用程序中定义自定义的时区，并带有多个可用的调整规则的信息，请参阅[如何： 创建带有调整规则的时间区域](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For information about defining a custom time zone with multiple adjustment rules that can be used in a historical time zone-aware application, see [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示有关在本地计算机的系统注册表中，包括起始和结束日期其调整规则定义的时区的所有信息。The following example displays information about all of the time zones defined in the local computer's system registry, including the starting and ending dates of their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/cs/DateStart1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/vb/DateStart1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan DaylightDelta { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan DaylightDelta
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightDelta As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan DaylightDelta { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取构成时区的夏令时所需的时间量。

span.span: Gets the amount of time that is required to form the time zone's daylight saving time.

summary.span: 将此时间量从协调世界时 (UTC) 添加到时区偏移量。

span.span: This amount of time is added to the time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象指示将添加到调整规则引起的标准时间更改的时间量。

span.span: A object that indicates the amount of time to add to the standard time changes as a result of the adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下公式定义时区的夏时制：The following formula defines a time zone's daylight saving time: ``` TimeZoneTime = BaseUtcOffset + DaylightDelta + UtcTime ``` 值属性介于 14 小时到-14 小时。The value of the property can range from 14 hours to -14 hours. > [!NOTE] > 属性衡量时区的标准时间与其夏时制之间的差值。The property measures the difference between the time zone’s standard time and its daylight saving time. 它不适用于更改时区的标准偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。It does not apply to changes in a time zone's standard offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 若要表示已更改其标准时间相对于 UTC 的时区，必须调用方法来创建新的时区。To represent a time zone that has changed its standard time offset from UTC, you must call the method to create a new time zone. 最常用的值的属性是 1.0 的小时数。The most common value of the property is 1.0 hours. 夏时制调整规则的应用程序增加一小时时区偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。The application of the daylight saving time adjustment rule increases the time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by one hour.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightTransitionEnd As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime
public: property TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd { TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取有关每年何时从夏时制转换回标准时间的信息。

span.span: Gets information about the annual transition from daylight saving time back to standard time.

value.span: 一个 对象，定义每年何时从夏时制转换回时区的标准时间。

span.span: A object that defines the annual transition from daylight saving time back to the time zone's standard time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象属性定义的固定日期规则或恢复到标准时间的浮动日期规则。The object returned by the property defines either a fixed-date rule or a floating-date rule for the return to standard time. 固定日期规则提供月、 日和时间发生转换。A fixed-date rule provides the month, day, and time of day on which the transition occurs. 浮动日期规则提供月、 周、 每周的日期和时间转换发生在一天中。A floating-date rule provides the month, week, day of the week, and time of day on which the transition occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightTransitionStart As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime
public: property TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart { TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取有关每年何时从标准时间转换为夏时制的信息。

span.span: Gets information about the annual transition from standard time to daylight saving time.

value.span: 一个 对象，定义每年何时从时区的标准时间转换为夏时制。

span.span: A object that defines the annual transition from a time zone's standard time to daylight saving time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象属性定义的固定日期规则或浮动日期规则转换为夏时制。The object returned by the property defines either a fixed-date rule or a floating-date rule for the transition to daylight saving time. 固定日期规则提供月、 日和时间发生转换。A fixed-date rule provides the month, day, and time of day on which the transition occurs. 浮动日期规则提供月，每周日期是星期几，并在转换发生的一天的时间。A floating-date rule provides the month, the week, the day of the week, and the time of day on which the transition occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Equals (TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule other);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule other) cil managed

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with the current object.

summary.span: 确定当前 对象是否等于第二个 对象。

span.span: Determines whether the current object is equal to a second object.

returns.span: 如果两个 对象具有相等的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if both objects have equal values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否两个对象是否相等，方法比较每个对象的成员值。To determine whether two objects are equal, the method compares the member values of each object. 两个调整规则是否相等，如果它们具有相同的生效日期、 相同的增量和的相同值对象由其和属性。Two adjustment rules are equal if they have the same effective dates, the same delta, and identical values for the objects returned by their and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来为加拿大中部标准时间和墨西哥标准时间中部标准时间比较的调整规则。The following example calls the method to compare the adjustment rules for Central Standard Time with those for Canada Central Standard Time and Mexico Standard Time. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#2)] 此代码将向控制台显示以下输出：This code displays the following output to the console: ``` Comparing Central Standard Time rule for 1/1/0001 to 12/31/9999 with: Canada Central Standard Time has no adjustment rules. Mexican CST for 1/1/0001 to 12/31/9999: Equal ```
